subject: Horse Racing
Hurricane Katrina
Gambling
lead_paragraph: While spending millions of dollars to repair damage from Hurricane Katrina, officials of Fair Grounds Race Course could not help but wonder if New Orleans residents would have the time or the desire to return to the track.
snippet: While spending millions of dollars to repair damage from Hurricane Katrina, officials of Fair Grounds Race Course could not help but wonder if New Orleans residents would have the time or the desire to return to the track.
